sqlMap.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS PAGING_RNUM, PAGING_A.* FROM (

select lh.m_loan_dt, lh.m_book_no, lh.m_rcv_plan_dt, lh.m_real_rcv_dt, lh.m_rcv_tp, case WHEN lh.m_status = '2' AND sysdate > to_datetime(lh.m_rcv_plan_dt||'235959','yyyymmddhh24miss') then '3' else lh.m_status END AS m_status, mi.m_no, mi.m_name, bi.m_title, bi.m_author, bi.m_publisher, mi.m_tel_no, mi.m_cell_no from loan_history lh, book_info bi, member_info mi where lh.m_area = bi.m_area and lh.m_book_no = bi.m_book_no and lh.m_area = mi.m_area and lh.m_no = mi.m_no and lh.m_area = #m_area#
lh.m_loan_dt between replace(#m_sdt#,'-','')||'000000' and replace(#m_edt#,'-','')||'235959'
lh.m_rcv_plan_dt = replace(#m_rcv_plan_dt#,'-','')
mi.m_name like '%'||#m_name#
bi.m_title like '%'||#m_title#||'%'
(mi.m_cell_no like '%'||replace(#m_tel_no#,'-','') or mi.m_tel_no like '%'||replace(#m_tel_no#,'-',''))
(lh.m_status = '2' and lh.m_rcv_plan_dt < sysdate)
lh.m_status = #m_status#
lh.m_rcv_tp = #m_rcv_tp#
order by lh.m_loan_dt desc

select lh.m_loan_dt, lh.m_book_no, lh.m_rcv_plan_dt, lh.m_real_rcv_dt, (select code_name from common_code where code_group_cd = '006' and code_cd = lh.m_rcv_tp) as m_rcv_tp, (select code_name from common_code where code_group_cd = '003' and code_cd = ( case WHEN lh.m_status = '2' AND sysdate > to_datetime(lh.m_rcv_plan_dt||'235959','yyyymmddhh24miss') then '3' else lh.m_status END)) AS m_status, mi.m_no, mi.m_name, bi.m_title, bi.m_author, bi.m_publisher, mi.m_tel_no, mi.m_cell_no from loan_history lh, book_info bi, member_info mi where lh.m_area = bi.m_area and lh.m_book_no = bi.m_book_no and lh.m_area = mi.m_area and lh.m_no = mi.m_no and lh.m_area = #m_area#
lh.m_loan_dt between replace(#m_sdt#,'-','')||'000000' and replace(#m_edt#,'-','')||'235959'
lh.m_rcv_plan_dt = replace(#m_rcv_plan_dt#,'-','')
mi.m_name like '%'||#m_name#
bi.m_title like '%'||#m_title#||'%'
(mi.m_cell_no like '%'||replace(#m_tel_no#,'-','') or mi.m_tel_no like '%'||replace(#m_tel_no#,'-',''))
(lh.m_status = '2' and lh.m_rcv_plan_dt < sysdate)
lh.m_status = #m_status#
lh.m_rcv_tp = #m_rcv_tp#
order by lh.m_loan_dt desc

select lh.m_rcv_plan_dt, case WHEN lh.m_status = '2' AND sysdate > to_datetime(lh.m_rcv_plan_dt||'235959','yyyymmddhh24miss') then '3' else lh.m_status END AS m_status, mi.m_no, mi.m_name, bi.m_book_no, bi.m_title, bi.m_author, bi.m_publisher, mi.m_tel_no, mi.m_cell_no from loan_history lh, book_info bi, member_info mi where lh.m_area = bi.m_area and lh.m_book_no = bi.m_book_no and lh.m_area = mi.m_area and lh.m_no = mi.m_no and lh.m_area = #m_area# and lh.m_status = '2' order by lh.m_rcv_plan_dt asc, mi.m_name asc
